name: Tomb of the Glitch King - LD 37 Entry
name_original: Tomb of the Glitch King - LD 37 Entry
description:
"Tomb of the Glitch King"

Made by KappaIX (a.k.a Doctor_Kappa, a.k.a. me!) in 48 hours.

Made for Ludem Dare 37 - theme "one room".

Step into the Tomb of the Glitch King, a single, ever changing room. Hunt the beast through his lair and defeat him... or be glitched into nothingness...

Thanks for playing!
